title: A Common Hobby
detail_text: <:th_ch0209/>Yoshiko-chan…. Yesterday’s stream…. Was interesting<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Huh, you were watching? Fuu…. It seems that you’ve fallen prey to my plan to increase the little demons watching Yohane from all worlds, Rina …. Also it’s Yohane….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I wish…. That I had…. Played that scenario like you<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Eh?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I’ll do it…. Yoshiko-chan’s way…. On my second run.... Rina-chan’s board   「Yeah」<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>Wait wait wait. Your second run….? Rina, you…. Cleared it?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>I did. I won’t…. Say anything though. I shouldn’t…. Spoil<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>F-, fuu…. Yohane is the type to take it slow, so! If Yohane is serious, I’ll clear it in no time, okay!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0209/>Alright. Umm…. When Yoshiko-chan clears it…. Should we….talk about the game?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0106/>You want to talk about it with me….? W-, well, if you say it like that then I have no choice but to clear it right away!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
